TopicTitle: can anyone teach me some basic calculations in restricted 3-body problem

Articles.Content: I found some of that on https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/161390-principia-challenge-munar-retrograde-rendezvous-122/ and I'm curious about where these numbers come from. I can solve Keplerian orbits only. The restricted 3-body problem is magic to me.

On 7/2/2024 at 11:41 AM, EwTE_H said:

I found some of that on https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/161390-principia-challenge-munar-retrograde-rendezvous-122/ and I'm curious about where these numbers come from. I can solve Keplerian orbits only. The restricted 3-body problem is magic to me.

I'm in the dark on this stuff also, but try to soak it up via repeated osmotic exposure hoping an aha moment occurs eventually.  This is a good foundation here for initially visualizing the math for me:

https://orbital-mechanics.space/the-n-body-problem/circular-restricted-three-body-problem.html
